Class GameArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameArena

  • public class GameArena
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a simple window in which grahical objects can be drawn. Instances of the Ball and Rectangle classes can be added to an instance of this class to draw and animate simple shapes on the screen.
    See Also:
    Ball, Rectangle

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameArena

        public GameArena(int width,
                 int height)
        Constructor. Creates an instance of the GameArena class, and displays a window on the screen upon which shapes can be drawn.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the window, in pixels.
        height - The height of the window, in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Close this GameArena window.

      • addBall

        public void addBall(Ball b)
        Adds a given Ball to the GameArena. Once a Ball is added, it will automatically appear on the window.
        Parameters:
        b - the ball to add to the GameArena.

      • removeBall

        public void removeBall(Ball b)
        Remove a Ball from the GameArena. Once a Ball is removed, it will no longer appear on the window.
        Parameters:
        b - the ball to remove from the GameArena.

      • addRectangle

        public void addRectangle(Rectangle r)
        Adds a given rectangle to the GameArena. Once a Rectangle is added, it will automatically appear on the window.
        Parameters:
        r - the rectangle to add to the GameArena.

      • removeRectangle

        public void removeRectangle(Rectangle r)
        Remove a Rectangle from the GameArena. Once a Rectangle is removed, it will no longer appear on the window.
        Parameters:
        r - the rectangle to remove from the GameArena.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause for a 1/50 of a second. This method causes your program to delay for 1/50th of a second. You'll find this useful if you're trying to animate your application.

      • getArenaWidth

        public int getArenaWidth()
        Gets the width of the GameArena window, in pixels.
        Returns:
        the width in pixels

      • getArenaHeight

        public int getArenaHeight()
        Gets the height of the GameArena window, in pixels.
        Returns:
        the height in pixels

      • upPressed

        public boolean upPressed()
        Determines if the user is currently pressing the cursor up button.
        Returns:
        true if the up button is pressed, false otherwise.

      • downPressed

        public boolean downPressed()
        Determines if the user is currently pressing the cursor down button.
        Returns:
        true if the down button is pressed, false otherwise.

      • leftPressed

        public boolean leftPressed()
        Determines if the user is currently pressing the cursor left button.
        Returns:
        true if the left button is pressed, false otherwise.

      • rightPressed

        public boolean rightPressed()
        Determines if the user is currently pressing the cursor right button.
        Returns:
        true if the right button is pressed, false otherwise.
